item.title: Tomato seeds may help combat varicose veins
item.description: Recent research at the University of Seoul has identified a number of components within tomato seeds that have the potential to combat varicose veins. Varicose veins are a common problem that can lead to discomfort and even serious complications if left untreated. The condition is caused by weakened vein walls that allow blood to pool and form bulges, typically in the legs and feet. The research team focused on the potential of tomato seeds, which are often discarded as waste, to provide therapeutic benefits.
